original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpīkataṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū thūpīkatam piṇḍapātam paṭiggaṇhanti pe
sama tittikam piṇḍapātam paṭiggahessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca thūpīkataṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca thūpīkatam piṇḍapātam paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa
